item.description:
Evening of Spirit Communication with Maria Halvorsen 
   Spirit medium Maria Halvorsen provides warm messages from your loved ones in heaven. Everyone receives a reading. Maria is a gifted psychic medium who serves to bring healing messages to people from loved ones who have passed.  Maria is well loved, heartful and filled with integrity. To register please contact Maria at 508-208-7139 or visit her website at www.mariahalvorsen.com   and go to the special events page.  Fee:  $50.  Maria accepts Mastercard and Visa.  Seating is limited to 10:  register in advance.  Please note, since Maria does her own registration, there may be no rsvp's listed on this Meetup.
   You may rsvp to this Meetup, but you must register directly with Maria. This program often fills and the Meetup rsvps do not reflect the number of registrations.

   For other events held at A Higher Balance Healing Center go to http://www.ahigherbalance.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at door next to H&R Block; go up one flight to 6B
item.name: Evening of spirit communication with Maria Halvorsen, psychic medium
